services.name: Routine Checkup & Cleaning
services.description: Comprehensive oral examination and professional cleaning by our dental hygienist. Includes plaque removal, polishing, and personalized care recommendations.

services.name: Teeth Whitening
services.description: Professional in-office whitening treatment for a brighter, more confident smile. Safe and effective results in just one session.

services.name: Root Canal Treatment
services.description: Expert endodontic treatment by our specialist to save an infected tooth. Modern techniques ensure minimal discomfort and excellent outcomes.

services.name: Dental Implants
services.description: State-of-the-art implant placement by our oral surgeon. A permanent solution to replace missing teeth that looks and feels natural.

services.name: Gum Disease Treatment
services.description: Periodontal therapy by our specialist, including natural herbal treatments. We treat all stages of gum disease to restore your oral health.

services.name: Pediatric Dentistry
services.description: Gentle, child-friendly dental care by our pediatric dentist. We make dental visits fun and stress-free for your little ones.

services.name: Aesthetic Dentistry
services.description: Transform your smile with crowns, veneers, and other cosmetic treatments. Custom-designed for natural, beautiful results.

services.name: Oral Surgery
services.description: Expert surgical procedures by our oral and maxillofacial surgeon. From wisdom teeth removal to complex extractions.

services.name: Anxiety Management
services.description: Nitrous oxide (laughing gas) sedation for anxious patients. Relax and feel comfortable during your dental treatment.

team.name: Dr. Ilan Ofeck
team.bio: Graduate of Tel Aviv University School of Dental Medicine with over 30 years of experience. Specializes in general dentistry and prosthodontics with a gentle, patient-focused approach.

team.name: Endodontic Specialist
team.bio: Our endodontic specialist handles all root canal treatments with precision and care, using the latest techniques for optimal outcomes.

team.name: Periodontal Specialist
team.bio: Specializing in gum disease treatment and prevention, including natural herbal therapies for healthier gums.

team.name: Oral Surgeon
team.bio: Our oral and maxillofacial surgeon performs implants, extractions, and other surgical procedures with expertise.

team.name: Pediatric Dentist
team.bio: Making dental visits fun for kids! Our pediatric dentist creates positive experiences for young patients.

team.name: Dental Hygienist
team.bio: Dedicated to patient comfort and education, providing thorough cleanings and personalized oral health guidance.

faqs.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
faqs.answer: We primarily see patients by appointment, but we do our best to accommodate emergencies. Please call ahead at 03-5467032.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, and work with most major health funds including Maccabi, Clalit, Meuhedet, and Leumit.

faqs.question: Is parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, parking is available at the Marom Bazal Medical Building where our clinic is located.

faqs.question: Do you treat children?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a dedicated pediatric dentist who specializes in making dental visits fun and stress-free for children of all ages.

faqs.question: I'm nervous about dental visits. Can you help?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Dr. Ofeck specializes in treating anxious patients. We offer nitrous oxide (laughing gas) sedation and a calm, gentle approach to help you feel comfortable.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency appointments?
faqs.answer: Yes, we do our best to see emergency patients the same day. Call us at 03-5467032 for urgent dental issues.

faqs.question: What languages do you speak?
faqs.answer: Our staff speaks Hebrew and English fluently.

policies.cancellation: Please provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations to avoid a cancellation fee.
policies.payment: Payment is due at the time of service. We work with most major health funds and can provide documentation for insurance reimbursement.
policies.emergency: For dental emergencies, call 03-5467032. We'll do our best to see you the same day.
